featured.text: During the second Industrial Age, people toiled at unusual hours in mines or factories and often had to get up for work early in the morning.

definition.zh_def: 辛苦工作，尤其是長時間的勞動。
definition.en_def: To work extremely hard and with effort, often for a long period.
definition.example: She had to toil in the fields from dawn until dusk.
